item.title: 纳瓦尼的寡妇说，新实验室证据证明他在监狱中被毒死 - 华盛顿邮报
item.description: Alexei Navalny的遗ow说实验室报告显示她的丈夫被中毒＆nbsp; nbsp; ABC News Alexey Navalny的遗ow说，实验室测试证明俄罗斯反对派人物在监狱中被中毒＆nbsp; cnn> cnn Navalny在垂死之前在监狱里呕吐并抽搐，他的妻子说＆nbsp; nbsp; 纽约时报

item.title: 随着以色列部队的前进，成千上万的巴勒斯坦人逃离了加沙市-BBC
item.description: 成千上万的巴勒斯坦人逃离加沙城，以色列军队前进＆nbsp; nbsp; bbc 以色列磅加沙城，因为内部＆nbsp; nbsp; 纽约时报href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmikgfbvv95cuxpac1uvlnhczrszjktlrdhdyc01xuk01xuk01xuk8xdwvhvhvhvhvhvgugu0wmnbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbb2v2v2v29telff5cfpsmg5cfpsmg NhNHVoek94dlB0VERkX1VzcUVQNXNpbHlsdW1XTXdrLW1ITWplUjNVSUpSVVc1MzlyLUZrNTRiVk5CU1V4T1dIdUhSZE1rOS10cHN1c1EzMG84amNRUzZjdw?oc=5" Target =“ _ Blank”>以色列军方在加沙市开始了地面攻势，因为成千上万的巴勒斯坦人逃离＆nbsp; nbsp; ap ap news> ap news> href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmic0fvx3lxte1blvdvzhvzhvlr3fmb1hzthdybm9svlnkbu1nb0z6b0z6cbe9cbe9cbe9cbe9cbe9cbe9lt ElyQ3DCAUF5BHDCCGIZRTIYDHUXAWVZSLDIRGLFZXLBRTD5SFLABEJMU2ZYCFDDNJXNJXNZC3VDVDVVNKO2T1FONM1FONM1HBXRVRMFPAM8？ Target =“ _ Blank”>以色列对加沙城的地面入侵进入第二天，因为更多的平民逃离＆nbsp; nbsp; 《华盛顿邮报》 href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmisafbvv95cuxoyxhiwkhgs0hmd2vptm9tu1zoqkvtquppzpepzfe3unfzqwzuy2hslslslslslslsls1swwm5vgglqulqunawi2rm5 myvpmyvjlmhzxulrnmnbxrhzbogtwmutxywntslpzvxnwb2zzqkxkx1mmhcr2pdc29mouxgaulubzkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkmwogflcmkkwkwkpmsfmsfmsfmsfmsfmsfmsfmsfmsfmsfmsfmsfmsfmsluu9osdyrusc1nln2ficuln2fficuhh2yx1wx1wkn2yxwyx​​fifectyxy42 yswkn2 yswkn2 yswkn2 yswyx.nlmn2 yswkn2 yswkn2 yswyx.rmhsn2 yswkn2 yswyxyx.nlms ZTMXPGCMTXQKPCD9IBTGFBVV95CUXQAEK5DJMWV0L6OHZDZ3AZ3AZAE5IQ2VES3HHSTAZO WZXSK9ZRZRMETDHB0P4DMFENWNNZLPDCFE2CMRTU3DVAKFJRG9VZDI1AMI1AJQZMLDPC gcyvew1 z1ppnuhzcvjJOudkwqTzoA1p6vnl5qm5qm5QM5ETITE1JSMG2CNPVYU8YYXZIETG5SEEE5A0ZNQW1LALY0WNUWDGR2GR2GR2GR2GR2GR2GR2GR2GR2GR2GR2GR2GR2DEDDEDWSKTLRRUFFNBG0YYTRUFFGDFGNYTRUFFGNYTRECOOC = 5.2JRVGD.2JRVGD.2 J.2JRVED.2 J.2JRV.2J.2JRV.2JRVED.2 J.2JRVED.2JRV.2J.2JRVED.2J.2JRVEF.2J.2JRVEDRALY target =“ _ blank”>成千上万的巴勒斯坦人逃离以色列炸弹，加沙市降雨＆nbsp; nbsp; <font color =“＃6f6f6f“

item.title: 尼泊尔新任73岁的临时总理苏希拉·卡尔基（Sushila Karki）是谁？ - 半岛电视台

item.title: 在玛德琳·麦肯（Madeleine McCann
item.description: 涉嫌在玛德琳·麦肯（Madeleine McCann）失踪中的德国男子从监狱释放＆nbsp; nbsp; 纽约时报href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbminwfbvv95cuxnbg9jtnvos2c2bgo1oxhor3f0svlbqu44444444444tm9wetyxzmrfmrfmrfmxpfd22zvazroruoo1ceeeez SGVydW1TT1FYYUh3WjlzM2ZNNFJHZThuSEdVMmQ2U2l1T1BXU0xBdFlnT1JDVkFTM3VEeDJKNHRKcGhzQjc4bk1SZExwZllVd0ZGR2o3a2RBQVZVQXRvN2tnbWE 3B1NNZUR1B1H0Q2_SAAQBQVVFEXFMTXBHBHBHBHBTNMCKP2VL9RAKZJUGDWYNBZYNBZYL90BGVUM3O1T1HRC3Z6VJJMMGMGJMMGMGZBZU03MGBZU03MGBZU03MG9LWNRWNRQNRNRQPHN0XPHWND2PHEND2PPHEND2PPHEND.PPHEND.PPHEND.PHWAUDD.PPHEND.PPHEND dydwdgqk9qovpfepfepehvmy0hzdmtecwxqnjnxql84vllvrnhtndf2f2udrvqky4zuvtb2dhdjm3n1btcflnbkpotly2tdjuwhlhlhlhmtrpseg3qzzndrjrjrjrjrjrjrjrdrdrjrjrdrodojrdordrodohm0gq- = 5' target =“ _ blank”>玛德琳·麦肯（Madeleine McCann）案的主要嫌疑人克里斯蒂安·布鲁克纳（Christian Brueckner）从德国监狱释放＆nbsp; nbsp; cbs news 英国幼儿玛德琳·麦肯（Madeleine McCann href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmiyafbvv95cuxnb1dsevk0dtzfwevhcxlqb ljnbxzyzwnzcmd6cklraldnmjbiu282cmnfqv9ovno4ndd3cvjkuhfir09stzctectaehyemvlz29mtwuybf fmoxu3z2nttux1lwxhtwww4wervovg4yupibmt6wthxtnpywtv6bxlzu2hwtvfnzzdizdiz0vyvgfhavzzx3i 2TM9RC29ZTJZTTDVPSKNMWK5SV1LAADFFETLQEHZVSNZRR09HRKVKX0ZGTET3MFVEMENWYNP0ZG？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>玛德琳·麦肯（Madeleine McCann）嫌疑人拒绝在德国监狱释放之前举行面试＆nbsp; nbsp; 守护者

item.title: 马拉维在总统选举中进行了票数，在总统选举中，经济动荡是最重要的问题 - 美联社新闻
item.description: 马拉维在总统选举中进行投票，在总统选举中，经济动荡是头等问题＆nbsp; nbsp; ap news 马拉维在经济危机中总统大选后进行投票＆nbsp; nbsp; al Jazeera href="https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMipwFBVV95cUxPSlBObXc2MkFsSGlVMWZOR2hwdlVIQlpHNElKT05tc3JiakdxN3JhRzhoaTY5a05jV0hPcW8ta3lvMERy MndHbHA3dFRBS3QwTHN5SmdDdUJldVJZTW0yM0I4QTdCdFh1VHJCaEFiNzQ3dlAwNUhoZzMtcldNOEJuZ054Z2dWVjN1ekE0djZxNmJDR3dYYTE4LUQ2MExUVms5U1N2em5CVQ?oc=5" target =“ _ blank”>马拉维对总统投票，经济困境隐约可见＆nbsp; nbsp; reuters 马拉维选举2025：选民等待总统民意调查以经济困境为主＆nbsp; 6f6f6f“> bbc 在马拉维总统大选中进行投票计算＆nbsp; nbsp; africanews.com

item.title: 报告发现，去年在拉丁美洲被杀或消失的120名土地和环境捍卫者
item.description: 去年在拉丁美洲被杀害或消失的120个土地和环境捍卫者，报告发现＆nbsp; nbsp; ap news '我们仍然处于黑暗中：缺失的土地捍卫者和对土著人民的土地冲突的致命损失 href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmilwfbvv95cuxnx0zxyxhguzvyuu9vyuu9vyy0ttu1favpxdkrfbxj5krfbxj5krfbxj5udhyee1jedhzqmxjdvvlqqqqukqk1puututututut t. mvotwi3r2licu5hd3zodtdtunzsdzlbjzluk1dauhozdzydflsdkrdsljsvxjumwn2yw5lmujcahhnb1ftbnrfbnrfbnrfbnrfbnrfbnrfbnrfbnrfbnrfbnrfbnrfbnrfbnrfbnrfbnrfbnrfbnrfbnrfbnrfbnrfbnrfbnrfc3duvhbtvzdvzdnmf9ebf9ebwv2sff2sff2sff2sff 2 target =“ _ blank”>新威胁目标土地和环境权利捍卫者＆nbsp;＆nbsp; 全球证人 捍卫地球是致命的。一份新报告阐明了多少。＆nbsp;＆nbsp; grist.org 哥伦比亚：2024年被暗杀的五分之四的活动家是拉丁美洲|国际＆nbsp; elpaís英语

item.title: 联合国调查委员会指责以色列在加沙的种族灭绝并敦促全球行动-PBS
item.description: 现在联合国说以色列也在加沙犯下种族灭绝。西方政府如何仍然拒绝采取行动？ href="https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMiuAFBVV95cUxNVjQyR1pRczBscGpZbUR1N2xCZ293SE1PR1NhdEFsX256bHA5ZEdMTmMwT0R3VmhhdVBlNlZqVTNNYVR3S g1ncetrwurzwjgys1dtsjb6rjb2q0c0c0tnddy0xyodhwdlz3cdbpb2txuhdymzbrseftqlv crzjrodytmvfzn3lsrdawqm1xzvnlz3dyx0 chysypud1zhd3g3ae9xowlktdbyamywbkrwv ldVcXA3X3RDVVNs0gG-AUFVX3lxTE4wbVp6eVFuV3NRNUNCc2Fvc21YdElROU9XeEQ5V0daUHNtcEJXbkptLWdyNnJOWHJpRVRCcmdSOUF6MlpKLUg1eElGc0F1NTRTS1hVNGxIelNPT vzpz1nsuwg5s0zks01rc1bde2r1ftwgyxcgvfmvfmvmviwltvhdvhdvfffwvffwv3pbmuhncfj0sulyetd erdfywkdortntmnmzaxjmuxrrdvr6mkhkmw1fck5zs05zdws​​5eu9ftty1dvdtree？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>加沙种族灭绝的羞辱以色列可能会煽动它，除非受到惩罚＆nbsp; nbsp; al href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmitafbvv95cuxqqml0czbnluuzq3pxzy0pktzzfquexnnbunglgunglgholghowc0xbdjoyldjoyldqylldqy3pxzudymhmhmhmhmhmhmhmhmhmhmhmhmhmhmhmhmhmhmhmhmhmhmhm4tvkngjnmhmhmhmhmhm4tvuecctrueccctectectectcicect frrota5rvzjcu1ymvjfm1lmbs1ws1c1c1netkylhxrm5wwwwmdqugfhajdmskzgwxbhn0u0rmw0ew1 ozeoynzzsvfhqsdvoeflgnlpcuznpvlfoykljodixdzc5q200lujlatrmswlabdblwmc？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>联合国询问发现，加沙＆nbsp; nbsp; REUTERS 联合国观看反驳：Pillay委员会2025年9月向人权委员会报告的法律分析＆nbsp; nbsp; <font color =“＃6f6f6f”

item.title: 美国军方确认它将观察员送往俄罗斯 - 贝拉鲁斯战争游戏 - 路透社
item.description: 俄罗斯进攻活动评估，2025年9月16日＆nbsp;＆nbsp; 战争研究所 href="https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMiqAFBVV95cUxPdTNGUnYwcm43U3RYNFp1ZUJWUHBGZmdUVVFHNDhfNENpNF9ZaGZpamwxSzc2eW1nanQ0YT c2Y1FNRDJwUXJOVTBiNXBXcGd6VGtiZjNpd051ek1scmxRNWFKbk9zTzhkRTVZZGo4VHlHMktYdUFjZWxLZlZZZWxlSmZnQ0ljSWp0LW8yS1RoN1ZxaXUxbnkxTEJ1Yi1 fWUNpZGl6UkU0LWjSAa4BQVVfeXFMTTdDMDAzay1OTEthU3hFb2s3aUh4MTdEWmVqdi1iTXVaZkxWSklmWUluUkxVaHYyVWFjT0VSTzVGYXFuRUNWQUV0bEJ0TDVfazFo sgwyrvhrywdjchdgchu3zfriovpoueljmklrn1rrmghkltqxtwdjexpdwdjexpd1hztf9bntbeoc1baxhrrmftbkknwnvlhvlhvlhvlhvlhvlhvlhvkzzzownbvkzownbvkzownbvvvvvvvvggnrrktyyktyktyykf3zjljljljul9onjul9onjnrr = oc = 5 Target =“ _ Blank”>印度在核武器中加入俄罗斯 - 贝拉鲁斯演习，在核武器发射彩排＆nbsp; nbsp; al Jazeera 美国观察白俄罗斯战争游戏，因为北约盟友感到莫斯科入侵的热量 href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmixafbvv95cuxnqkvwv1dqwhbpq2xwtmlv Z0HRCXJMSVHLNNNTOGU5DLRMVJHKB1C0ZJHTS2RCNUK2BDBNQTRGTJU4AVLIDKPUULZRZRTXKYRU1FD0D STHLXV0W5UNV4UUN0RKVNRS1LMWPKT1FYAFI5EHDTSNLZUJHVDKRTDZUWMMFYQ0FOAKTPNHZPVUFXNM FWS0H0AI1NNWPKTG9FTKX3MTI4Q3VRVRVGXAOC1LYVFZVEY0NMWWWSZJORWZYWHBYWHBYUFN4NXNEXNEUZ？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>莫斯科和明斯克的排练在白俄罗斯部署的核武器发射，卢卡申科说＆nbsp; nbsp; 6f6f6f“> reuters

item.title: 研究说，俄罗斯在210个地点灌输了乌克兰的儿童 - 《纽约时报》
item.description: 俄罗斯在210个地点灌输了来自乌克兰的儿童，研究说＆nbsp; nbsp; 纽约时报 href="https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMioAFBVV95cUxOZmhPTzVoWFhUSWF0YXNCYXdIR1VtalF5TWxlQkRRTHBvSVZzMk1UUEpoZ0wtaUNTV S1WODNXCLE1R0VMOS13U3HCYMFJRTLHVG5RTERJAL9LYMXQEU1DNM1NAFHREWTZNHPPVNZZMVN6DHBLAZAWU0FBYL90AFBYL90A3E3EZEME1OUZEME1OUZEME1OUVNGRGJ6QUVNGRGJ6Q21Q21Q21Q2Q2DADA xn6vg1xmlvbsfhw0ggmaufvx3lxte9stnzzafa4nhpomxvptfy1qkhhhr1fwn2hkcjbuuhvrnedpvnlnedpvnl5tyzldizldizldiqqmk1nrdflqmk1kyk1kyk50lvppppppppppppppppppppppppppppppppppppppppppppppppppppppppttttukc5 ukc5 ukc5 cccc5 ccc5 ccc5 c.5 c.5 c.5 c.5 c.5 c.5 Xh1eGplXzZlTDk2b2lvQkd1Y2tlSGdzbDd1OXE1cHkwVE90MG9SdW9nNjVsSWk4aGRMa19wQVR3djc1dnZiUE5BYV85NzF2VG9zU09qUVJfZmtTNnFLVUE?oc=5" Target =“ _ Blank”>俄罗斯在210个设施中绑架了被绑架的乌克兰儿童“强迫军事化”，研究发现＆nbsp; nbsp; CBS News href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmiugfbvv95cuxob2cwuzzvuzbxwhbxwhbzn1h4ufnhfnhfnhfnhfnhfnhfnhfv3pj41zuck41zux1qtblntmnzjribnzjrnzjrnz5gllnz5gliblib uvyzftyghulz2ptlyzftydgtyptydgtyptydgtyptyghulzulib lighrnz3ptydgtypyakususnz3ptyvtypyakusrnz3ptyvtypyakusrib 2E5NV9FQKDXDXBHZKDWVUXDU29LZVB5SZZNRKXPWMZIR3E2ZKRWBFRRYWHUEUDGRWRZRFRZRFFFTFFTFFT3GYQ le2lwo4m2htyu1xaezoamdlu24tckstcde0smc1cfo5awlnsm9hagztsv96mvffyttzha0e？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>乌克兰被盗的孩子：俄罗斯内部的重新教育和军事化网络 href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmizgfbvv95cuxorhlqmmf3qulsb1lqbuiyyywd 4CGK1BGZFSDFUSMVZS3N4RKP5QVZWNJZJQZHBU0FZU1FKSGFKFJAI1KMVUWQMVUWQMZUVMR4UC1LA3BYRHI4VZHWRV nmrvgydwtlwmqxdhz5sw40dwpnzldxderirkjrnnhprxfpx2jhefizrzdtutrid1ruewqwv3hise9znxfou xrfyjjpb0tnelhovg1kn2pns09pzxlqyzd4eeljq1bsanbkbbeprdljauejtzmjmjmjmjmjmjmjmjm5a0nrcupuuq？oc = 5“ Target =“ _ Blank”>俄罗斯拥有200个营地网络，用于'洗脑'乌克兰儿童 - 报告＆nbsp; nbsp; 守护者href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmitafbvv95cuxqreuztfoxvtrquna3sdcts09vtjmxuetdx3lyt0niwtzq wvbytvziv3p6mfzluwjyrc1unelvylhlaxnuvu05mmpfn1jkqwitmuh4uujuzjleltjiy3noehhhkdvzcququ01mkteots3gzt3hnzk1t nmjeujfnze9dendiunfdqkdpbgn1afeyqwvysxjaretwufm0a1rtefjctjctjjucgninepjrgpouw03b2lic1tsavzbvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvn cuxob0nrslvh BGGXALFNT3H5BXJQUVO0AVCXZNY2ZMT0ANDPATQWOWHPLXCYUTJKDUTKD00XUKM1NXLBRHNXNEETUK9INGFSCUQ2NFFFR3FFR3OTDW？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>乌克兰儿童已被带到俄罗斯的200多个设施，新报告发现＆nbsp; nbsp; nbc news

item.title: 中国，菲律宾的船只在南中国海有争议的浅滩附近碰撞 - 半岛电视台

item.title: 内塔尼亚胡（Netanyahu）提前告诉特朗普关于多哈罢工，他“没有拒绝” - 报道 - 以色列时代
item.description: 内塔尼亚胡告诉特朗普提前关于多哈罢工，他'没有说'' - 报告＆nbsp; nbsp; 以色列时代href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmifkfvx3lxte5bzfzfzfexvpqk4yrwmyae9hq2n4bel3b2qxetfoty0tttlbqtg1pwgno ETQ0VUFZWKZVNNY2CGRQMHRCDVE0DMDQQQQQQQQ0NKVFHMN0DRTJA1ALJHVU5ZR1DFBGDPCEJTT2PKV2PKVQBDPKVQBUD4CJJJJJJJJNNA2HNA2H42H4VNPYUFFHHZC1NCC1NCC1NCCU1KDW？ target =“ _空白”>以色列的卡塔尔攻击是昂贵的失败＆nbsp;＆nbsp; axios 特朗普说，在以色列在卡塔尔罢工之前，内塔尼亚胡没有告知他＆nbsp; nbsp; reuters 海湾国家希望唐纳德·特朗普（Donald Trump href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmizgfbvvv95cuxqdwvtmu80dgxfsg1nvm 9ctjnitglpz1deyzhrtgzprzprzirmlwrxnnv2ltbmngunvgr01cbzjvrgw5vvp1dfrrt2nvmjuyt09 NBNZVB1VVLTRCVTDCNHRUHF6EDQ0BMJFVFDQS3DFX05OAZNMY01CZMFVRLNRQLCYEKLZMFHZU3OZ zxvycuznymfctxKXze5wc29Toey3oe9OWHJ3V0NRWGHPAESXR3UZSMRZTK0TCTU2EHDPWDPWDF3SZG0A dytvxlfvmotrgprz9ib0wfbvv95cuxqr3dnm2hpahqxwhqxwhfyys1ca1vxagduz0twzw92cfhuslfpvt fmmnzqqqkvqadq4ajrxekkk5y1q1ajvnak1qegy5c3l2se1rhdhshdnwfi4mty2n1fpyxludwd0uc0 tcnnazhd5vzftttyrzcwbmpfngzvuwdxr2timvdcnhoysvnpykzovuztcv94u1i4zdvtuvhytwzt vtdxzncxvy1cuhq2ztvivmwymwfwmef1tuljq3vnqi1ztnhzrhjzrhjzmkywulftujzqbdzvsmfn？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>卡塔尔峰会回应以色列对多哈的哈马斯罢工，几乎没有动作＆nbsp; nbsp; pbs
